title: The Commissioner may permit construction of staff quarters for the employees of Govt
clause_text: The Commissioner may permit construction of staff quarters for the employees of Govt. /MCGM/their statutory bodies (hereinafter referred to as “User Authority’’) on private plots of lands, having minimum area of 2000sq.m and abutting a
